title: Bilawal, Belgian FM discuss bilateral, global matters
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 19 (APP): Foreign Minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari on Thursday met Foreign Minister of Belgium Hadja Lahbib and discussed bilateral, regional and global issues of mutual interest.
Bilawal appreciated the support extended by the government of Belgium for the flood-affected people of Pakistan.
Both sides expressed the resolve to further strengthen  economic, trade, investment and cultural cooperation.
Bilawal Bhutto also met Axel Van Trotsenburg, Managing Director Operations of World Bank and discussed its engagement with Pakistan.
He lauded the pledge of the World Bank of $2 billion made at Resilient Pakistan Conference and also mentioned its important role as a  major development partner.
Both side expressed the resolve to achieving shared goals.
